docs.lead_paragraph: THERE doesn't seem to be any exact count of the number of skiers in the United States, but it is well over two million. Most of them took up the sport in their twenties and thirties, and quite a number obviously believe that life begins at 40. However, only a small percentage of them are really good skiers.

headline.main: They're Never Too Young to Ski; Children of the Northern States are growing up to be a generation at home on the snows

docs.snippet: THERE doesn't seem to be any exact count of the number of skiers in the United States, but it is well over two million. Most of them took up the sport in their twenties and thirties, and quite a number obviously believe that life begins at 40....
